Protocols/CISTimerProtocol.html#/c:objc(.name: -cleanUp
Protocols/CISTimerProtocol.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Notification that Conviva no longer needs this TimerProtocol.

Protocols/CISTimeProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.name: -getEpochTimeMs
Protocols/CISTimeProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Get the current time in milliseconds since UNIX epoch.

Protocols/CISTimeProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.name: -cleanUp
Protocols/CISTimeProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Notification that Conviva no longer needs this TimeProtocol.

Protocols/CISStorageProtocol.html#/c:obj.name: -cleanUp
Protocols/CISStorageProtocol.html#/c:obj.abstract: Notification that Conviva no longer needs this StorageProtocol.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -getDuration
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Returns the latest duration collected by this PlayerStateManager instance.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setDuration:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the duration of the video stream played by the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -getPlayerType
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Returns the last player type collected by this PlayerStateManager instance.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setPlayerType:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the type of player monitored via the PlayerInterface instance.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -getPlayerVersion
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Returns the last player framework version collected by this PlayerStateManager instance.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setPlayerVersion:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the version of the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -getPlayerState
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Returns the current state of the video player monitored by the PlayerInterface instance.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setPlayerState:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the new player state of the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -getBitrateKbps
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Returns the last bitrate collected from the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setBitrateKbps:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the new bitrate of the video stream played by the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setAvgBitrateKbps:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the new average bitrate of the video stream played by the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -sendError:errorSeverity:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports an error while playing a video stream in the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setCISIClientMeasureInterface:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Setter for CISIClientMeasureInterface.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setVideoResolutionWidth:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the video resolution width of video stream played by the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setVideoResolutionHeight:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the video resolution height of video stream played by the related video player.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setCDNServerIPAddress:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the Edge Server CDN IP Address for the video stream played.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setSignalStrength:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the signal strength of the connected network.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setLinkEncryption:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the link encryption type of the connected network.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setConnectionType:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the connection type of the connected network.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setSeekStart:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the player seek start.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -setSeekEnd:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports the player seek end.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -isPlayerSeeking
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Reports YES only when setSeekStart() was called.Default Value is NO.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -updateStreamUrl:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Notify Conviva that the stream Url has changed for the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -updateCDNName:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Notify Conviva that the CDN Name has changed for the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -updateResource:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Notify Conviva that the Resource has changed for the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -updateContentMetadata:
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Updates ContentMetadata.

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: -reset
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Discard the video quality data contained in this PlayerStateManager instance.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getOperatingSystemVersion
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: A version of the operating system used by the device.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getDeviceType
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: Required the type of the device. One of Console, Settop, Mobile and PC.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getDeviceVersion
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: A version of the device. Usually, low-level information pertaining to the hardware.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getFrameworkName
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: The name of the framework used by your application, if applicable.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getFrameworkVersion
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: A version of the framework used by your application, if applicable.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getPlatformVersion
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: A version of the platform used by the device.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -getPlatformName
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: A version of the platform name used by the device.

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -cleanUp
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: Notification that Conviva no longer needs this MetadataProtocol.

Protocols/CISLoggingProtocol.html#/c:obj.name: -cleanUp
Protocols/CISLoggingProtocol.html#/c:obj.abstract: Notification that Conviva no longer needs this LoggingProtocol.

Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html#/c:objc.name: -getModuleName
Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html#/c:objc.abstract: Return the name of a client module.

Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html#/c:objc.name: -getModuleVersion
Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html#/c:objc.abstract: Return the version of a client module.

Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html#/c:objc.name: -setModuleNameAndVersion:clientVersion:
Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html#/c:objc.abstract: Set the name and version of a client module implementation.

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: -getPHT
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Return the pht of a player instance in milliseconds.

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: -getBufferLength
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Return the buffer length of a player instance in milliseconds.

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: -getEncodedFrames
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Return the encoded frames per second of a player instance in seconds.

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: -getAverageFrames
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Return the average frames per second of a player instance in seconds.

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: -getRenderedFrames
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Return the rendered frames per second of a player instance in seconds.

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: -getDroppedFrames
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Return the average frames per second of a player instance in seconds.

Protocols/CISHTTPProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.name: -makeRequestWithurl:data:timeoutSeconds:httpMethod:contentType:httpHeaderValue:httpHeaderField:completionHandler:
Protocols/CISHTTPProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Send an HTTP request. HTTPS should be handled as well.

Protocols/CISHTTPProtocol.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Notification that Conviva no longer needs this HttpProtocol object.

Protocols/CISClientSettingProtocol.html#.name: -setCustomerKey:
Protocols/CISClientSettingProtocol.html#.abstract: Required setter for the Conviva account data will be reported to.

Protocols/CISClientSettingProtocol.html#.name: -setHeartbeatInterval:
Protocols/CISClientSettingProtocol.html#.abstract: Setter for the time interval at which the Conviva will send available data to the Conviva platform. In seconds,

Protocols/CISClientSettingProtocol.html#.name: -setGatewayUrl:
Protocols/CISClientSettingProtocol.html#.abstract: Setter for the URL of the Conviva platform to report data to.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -attachPlayer:playerStateManager:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Attach a video player to the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -reportError:errorMessage:errorSeverity:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Reports an error for this monitoring session.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -updateContentMetadata:metadata:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Update missing content metadata for an existing monitoring session.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -detachPlayer:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Detach the video player from the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -contentPreload:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Notification that we will be preloading content with the video player.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -contentStart:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Notification that the attached video player is no longer preloading, and has started displaying video for the viewer.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -adStart:adStream:adPlayer:adPosition:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Notify Conviva that an ad is about to start for the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -adEnd:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Notify Conviva that an ad has ended for the monitoring session.

Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.name: -isPlayerAttached:
Protocols/CISClientProtocol.html#/c:objc.abstract: Check if any PlayerStateManager is already attached to a session.

Protocols/CISCallbackProtocol.html#/c:ob.name: -done:responseString:
Protocols/CISCallbackProtocol.html#/c:ob.abstract: Required when needed to implement an action with.

Protocols/CISCallbackProtocol.html.name: CISCallbackProtocol
Protocols/CISCallbackProtocol.html.abstract: Callback interface used by SystemInterface implementation to notify Conviva.

Protocols/CISCancelProtocol.html.name: CISCancelProtocol
Protocols/CISCancelProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol that can be used to cancel the actions.

Protocols/CISHTTPProtocol.html.name: CISHTTPProtocol
Protocols/CISHTTPProtocol.html.abstract: Class conforming to this will be responsible for implementing required methods for HTTP(s) tasks,

Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.name: CISIClientMeasureInterface
Protocols/CISIClientMeasureInterface.htm.abstract: Reports player related metrics required by Conviva SDK.

Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html.name: CISIModuleVersion
Protocols/CISIModuleVersion.html.abstract: Required to set the name and version of a client module.

Protocols/CISLoggingProtocol.html.name: CISLoggingProtocol
Protocols/CISLoggingProtocol.html.abstract: Class conforming to this will be responsible for implementing required methods for logging,

Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html.name: CISMetadataProtocol
Protocols/CISMetadataProtocol.html.abstract: Class conforming to this will be responsible for implementing required methods for system information,

Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..name: CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol
Protocols/CISPlayerStateManagerProtocol..abstract: Helper class to store and relay pertinent video player data to Conviva.

Protocols/CISRunnableProtocol.html.name: CISRunnableProtocol
Protocols/CISRunnableProtocol.html.abstract: Used by the Conviva library to run timer action.

Protocols/CISStorageProtocol.html.name: CISStorageProtocol
Protocols/CISStorageProtocol.html.abstract: Class conforming to this will be responsible for implementing required methods for storing data,

Protocols.html#/c:objc(pl)CISSystemFacto.name: CISSystemFactoryProtocol
Protocols.html#/c:objc(pl)CISSystemFacto.abstract: Provides access to system information and utilities according to chosen settings.

Protocols.html#/c:objc(pl)CISSystemInter.name: CISSystemInterfaceProtocol
Protocols.html#/c:objc(pl)CISSystemInter.abstract: Used by the Conviva library to access system information and utilities.

Protocols/CISTimeProtocol.html.name: CISTimeProtocol
Protocols/CISTimeProtocol.html.abstract: Class conforming to this will be responsible for implementing required methods for a fetching time,

Protocols/CISTimerProtocol.html.name: CISTimerProtocol
Protocols/CISTimerProtocol.html.abstract: Class conforming to this will be responsible for implementing required methods for initiating timers,

Enums/LogLevel.html#/c:@E@LogLevel@LOGLE.name: LOGLEVEL_INFO
Enums/LogLevel.html#/c:@E@LogLevel@LOGLE.abstract: Will only display warning and error log messages.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/c:@E@LogLevel@LOGLE.name: LOGLEVEL_ERROR
Enums/LogLevel.html#/c:@E@LogLevel@LOGLE.abstract: Will display all log messages except debugging messages.

Enums/StreamType.html#/c:@E@StreamType@C.name: CONVIVA_STREAM_UNKNOWN
Enums/StreamType.html#/c:@E@StreamType@C.abstract: It is not yet known what the type of streaming is.

Enums/StreamType.html#/c:@E@StreamType@C.name: CONVIVA_STREAM_LIVE
Enums/StreamType.html#/c:@E@StreamType@C.abstract: Content for this session is streamed live.

Enums/StreamType.html#/c:@E@StreamType@C.name: CONVIVA_STREAM_VOD
Enums/StreamType.html#/c:@E@StreamType@C.abstract: Content for this session is streamed on demand.

Enums/AdPosition.html#/c:@E@AdPosition@A.name: ADPOSITION_PREROLL
Enums/AdPosition.html#/c:@E@AdPosition@A.abstract: The ad is a preroll, kicking in before content.

Enums/AdPosition.html#/c:@E@AdPosition@A.name: ADPOSITION_MIDROLL
Enums/AdPosition.html#/c:@E@AdPosition@A.abstract: The ad is a midroll, kicking in during content.

Enums/AdPosition.html#/c:@E@AdPosition@A.name: ADPOSITION_POSTROLL
Enums/AdPosition.html#/c:@E@AdPosition@A.abstract: The ad is a postroll, kicking in after content.

Enums/AdPlayer.html#/c:@E@AdPlayer@ADPLA.name: ADPLAYER_CONTENT
Enums/AdPlayer.html#/c:@E@AdPlayer@ADPLA.abstract: Ads and content are played using the same video player instance.

Enums/AdPlayer.html#/c:@E@AdPlayer@ADPLA.name: ADPLAYER_SEPARATE
Enums/AdPlayer.html#/c:@E@AdPlayer@ADPLA.abstract: Ads and content are played using separate video player instances.

Enums/AdStream.html#/c:@E@AdStream@ADSTR.name: ADSTREAM_CONTENT
Enums/AdStream.html#/c:@E@AdStream@ADSTR.abstract: The ad is embedded inside the video content stream.

Enums/AdStream.html#/c:@E@AdStream@ADSTR.name: ADSTREAM_SEPARATE
Enums/AdStream.html#/c:@E@AdStream@ADSTR.abstract: The ad is played from a separate video stream.

Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.name: CONVIVA_STOPPED
Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.abstract: Report this state when you can confirm that the player is currently inactive/idle.

Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.name: CONVIVA_PLAYING
Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.abstract: Report this state when you can confirm that the player is actively rendering video content for the viewer.

Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.name: CONVIVA_BUFFERING
Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.abstract: Report this state when you can confirm that the player is stalled due to lack of video data in the buffer.

Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.name: CONVIVA_PAUSED
Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.abstract: Report this state when you can confirm that the player is paused, generally upon viewer request.

Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.name: CONVIVA_NOT_MONITORED
Enums/PlayerState.html#/c:@E@PlayerState.abstract: Report this state when no other recognized Conviva player states apply.

Enums/PlayerState.html.name: PlayerState
Enums/PlayerState.html.abstract: All possible player states reported to Conviva.

Enums/DeviceType.html.name: DeviceType
Enums/DeviceType.html.abstract: All possible device types reported to Conviva.

Enums/AdStream.html.name: AdStream
Enums/AdStream.html.abstract: All possible stream type that contains video advertisement.

Enums/AdPlayer.html.name: AdPlayer
Enums/AdPlayer.html.abstract: All possible video player in charge of rendering video advertisement.

Enums/AdPosition.html.name: AdPosition
Enums/AdPosition.html.abstract: All possible position of video advertisement relative to content.

Enums/ErrorSeverity.html.name: ErrorSeverity
Enums/ErrorSeverity.html.abstract: All possible severity of errors reported to Conviva.

Enums/StreamType.html.name: StreamType
Enums/StreamType.html.abstract: Stream type which will be played by the player for the video session.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Log level setting for the SDK client.

Constants.html#/c:@NO_SESSION_KEY.name: NO_SESSION_KEY
Constants.html#/c:@NO_SESSION_KEY.abstract: A default sessionKey to use for the Client.sendCustomEvent API if you do not yet have a Conviva session.

Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: logLevel

Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: allowUncaughtExceptions
Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Whether to allow or catch runtime exceptions.

Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: storageTimeout
Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: How long the Conviva client will wait for a response when attempting to access device storage before considering that attempt a failure in seconds, the default value will work for the overwhelming majority of devices.

Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: httpTimeout
Classes/CISSystemSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: How long the Conviva client will wait for a response when attempting to access device storage before considering that attempt a failure in seconds,

Classes/CISSystemFactoryCreator.html#/c:.name: +createWithCISSystemInterface:setting:
Classes/CISSystemFactoryCreator.html#/c:.abstract: Constructs systemFactory instance, provides access to system information and utilities according to chosen settings.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.name: assetName
Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.abstract: A unique identifier for the content, preferably human-readable.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.name: defaultBitrateKbps
Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Default bitrate to report for this content.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.name: defaultResource
Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Default video server resource to report for this content.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.name: duration
Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Duration of the video content, in seconds.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.name: cdnName
Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Video server cdn to report for the content.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.name: encodedFramerate
Classes/CISContentMetadata.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Duration of the video content, in seconds.

Classes/CISClientCreator.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Most applications will only need one client, created during application initialization and released during application shutdown.

Classes/CISClientSettingCreator.html.abstract: Helper class required for creating a class instance conforming to protocol CISClientSettingProtocol.

Classes/CISContentMetadata.html.name: CISContentMetadata

Classes/CISSystemInterfaceCreator.html.abstract: Used by the Conviva library to access system information and utilities.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)IOSMetadataInter.name: IOSMetadataInterface

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)IOSTimeInterface.abstract: Conviva provided helper class which implements CISTimeProtocol required methods.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)IOSTimerInterfac.abstract: Conviva provided helper class which implements CISTimerProtocol required methods.
